```{css, echo = FALSE}
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@100;300;400&display=swap');

.tocify {
  color: #545454;
  font-size: 14px;
  background-color: #E7E7E7;
}

.divider {
  background-color: #1A5B7E;
  width: 100%;
  height: 3px;
  margin: 30px 0 15px 0;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
.tocify-header {
    text-indent: 10px;
}

.tocify .list-group-item {
  border-radius: 0px;
  color: #545454;
  font-size: 14px;
  background-color: #E7E7E7;
}

body {
 padding: 1em;
 max-width: 100%;
}
.dataTables_wrapper {
  overflow-x: auto;
}
div.main-container {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
}
.row {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
}
table.table {
  margin: 0;
  min-width: 100%;
}
.toc-content {
  flex: 1;
}
.col-md-3 {
  width: 300px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
#TOC {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 850px) {
  .row {
    flex-direction: column;
    margin: 0;
  }
  .col-md-3 {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
  }
  .toc-content {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
  }
  #TOC {
    position: relative;
    margin: 0;
  }
  div.tocify {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
  }
}


.list-group-item.active:hover {
  background-color: #1A5B7E;
}


h1, h2, h3, h4 {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
}

h1 {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #1A5B7E;
  font-size: 2em;
}

h2 {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #9DCFE6;
  font-size: 1.5em;
}

h3 {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #9DCFE6;
  font-size: 1.17em;
}

h4 {
  font-style: normal;
  color: #1A5B7E;
}

text, p, ol, ul {
  color: #545454;
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
}

img {
  width: 100%;
}

a {
  color: #5EABA6;
}

a:hover {
  color: #E43E31;
}
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
args <- commandArgs(trailingOnly = TRUE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(jsonlite)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(DT)
library(ggsci)
```

```{r table, echo=FALSE}
qc_table <- read.delim(flomics_report)
datatable(qc_table, options = list(
  pageLength = nrow(qc_table)
)) %>%
  formatStyle(columns = colnames(qc_table[3:12]), backgroundColor = styleEqual(c("pass","fail", "warn"), c("#bfffb0", "#ffc7b0", "#ffeeb0"))) #nolint
```
